meanings.definition: A phrase or statement written in memory of a person who has died.
meanings.sent1: The epitaph on the gravestone honored the memory of the deceased.
meanings.sent2: Visitors to the cemetery read the epitaphs on the tombstones to learn about the people buried there.
meanings.sent3: The witty epitaph on the tombstone made passersby smile.
meanings.sent4: The epitaph on the tombstone served as a lasting tribute to the departed soul.
meanings.sent5: The heartfelt epitaph captured the essence of the person's life in just a few words.

meanings.definition: A brief inscription on a tombstone.
meanings.sent1: The epitaph engraved on the tombstone was simple yet poignant.
meanings.sent2: Family members gathered around the tombstone to read the epitaph together.
meanings.sent3: The epitaph on the tombstone seemed to whisper a secret message to those who passed by.
meanings.sent4: The epitaph on the tombstone was like a silent storyteller of the person's life.
meanings.sent5: The weathered epitaph on the tombstone hinted at a life well-lived.
